page.title: 19Grangewood garden centre
page.content: The garden centre at Grangewood near Lullington is a recent addition to the services provided in the area. It is situated on rented land adjacent to Grangewood Hall & is managed by one man. He employs one man full-time & another participating in a YTS. Daily opening times are between 9:30 am & 5:00 pm. Despite its relatively remote{ position it attracts customers from several kms around eg. Burton, Swadlincote, Lichfield & Tamworth. Several people visiting the centre at the time of our survey said that they had, "come out for a drive". The majority of plants are brought from wholesalers. A huge variety of garden & house plants are displayed both under glass & in plots outside. A limited selection of garden furniture is also available.
